name: my-portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website built with Node.js and TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: npx copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.png src/**/*.jpg src/**/*.jpeg src/**/*.svg src/data/**/* dist/
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
